text: Larry Papadopoulos is an Australian mixed martial artist. He competed in the Middleweight and Heavyweight divisions. A trainee of Rigan Machado black belt John Donehue, he was one of Pancrase's first Brazilian jiu-jitsu fighters. ==Mixed martial arts record== |- | Win | align=center| 5-5-3 | Tim Thomas | Submission
